channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Worry-Free Business Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Worry-Free Business Security

item.title: CVE-2021-44021|2024-08-04T04:10:17.287Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20worry-free%20business%20security
item.description: An unnecessary privilege vulnerability in Trend Micro Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability. This vulnerability is similar to but not identical to CVE-2021-44019 and 44020.

item.title: CVE-2021-44019|2024-08-04T04:10:17.188Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20worry-free%20business%20security
item.description: An unnecessary privilege vulnerability in Trend Micro Worry-Free Business Security 10.0 SP1 could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability. This vulnerability is similar to but not identical to CVE-2021-44020 and 44021.

item.title: CVE-2021-45442|2024-08-04T04:39:20.981Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20worry-free%20business%20security
item.description: A link following denial-of-service vulnerability in Trend Micro Worry-Free Business Security (on prem only) could allow a local attacker to overwrite arbitrary files in the context of SYSTEM. This is similar to, but not the same as CVE-2021-44024. Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
